content.text: Do not change the column headers in Row 1 as this is used to complete the upload.
The table below lists the columns and which columns are required or optional.
Site Name - Required field with maximum length of 50 characters.
Determined from initial sale. Enter Company Name or division if multi-sites were purchased.
Warehouse - Required field.
Part # - Required field with maximum length of 36 characters.
Each must be unique. Choose either the actual Part ID for this field, an assigned company number, or unique name.
Description - Required field with maximum length of 100 characters.
Description of the part.
Part Type - Required field with maximum length of 24 characters.
Part type is a way to group similar parts or the field can be used to show what the part fits on.
Status - Required field with maximum length of 24 characters.
Status of the part when purchased, New, Rebuilt, Used, Stock, Non-Stock, etc.
Unit of Measure - Required field with maximum length of 24 characters.
How the part is dispensed: Each, Gallons, Quarts, Ounces, Set, Pair, etc.
Barcode # - Optional field with maximum length of 20 characters.
Bin Location - Optional field with maximum length of 24 characters.
Vendor ID - Optional field with maximum length of 24 characters.
Vendor Part # - Optional field with maximum length of 36 characters.
Each Cost
The cost of the part. Enter only numbers, do not use currency symbols.
Year - Optional field.
Beginning Quantity - Required field.
Quantity currently on hand.
Level Min - Optional field.
This quantity triggers reorder notification. When inventory is less than the minimum, inventory reorder reports and purchase orders can be generated.
Level Norm - Optional field.
This is the preferred normal stock quantity.
Level Max - Optional field.
Tracks stock overages. When the maximum quantity is surpassed, the item is listed on the inventory overage report.
Favorite - Optional field (T/F).
TRUE - Favorited items in a specific warehouse will be visible when looking at that warehouse.
FALSE - Must go to the master parts list to see the part.
Tracked - Optional field (T/F).
TRUE - Tracks consumption. Will not allow work orders to use part if inventory is empty.
FALSE - Will not track consumption.
Note - Optional field.
Custom Fields 1 to 6 - Optional fields.
User Defined Fields: Please rename the field. For dropdown lists, the character limit is 24.
Site Name - Required - Company name or division for multi-sites
Warehouse - Required
Part # - Required - Unique identifier for the part
Description - Required - Description of the part
Part Type - Required - Groups similar parts or shows what part fits on
Status - Required - New, Rebuilt, Used, Stock, Non-Stock, etc.
Unit of Measure - Required - Each, Gallons, Quarts, Ounces, Set, Pair, etc.
Barcode # - Optional
Bin Location - Optional
Vendor ID - Optional
Vendor Part # - Optional
Each Cost - Optional - Cost of the part, numbers only
Year - Optional
Beginning Quantity - Required - Quantity currently on hand
Level Min - Optional - Triggers reorder notification
Level Norm - Optional - Preferred normal stock quantity
Level Max - Optional - Tracks stock overages
Favorite - Optional - T/F for warehouse visibility
Tracked - Optional - T/F for consumption tracking
Note - Optional
Custom Fields 1 to 6 - Optional - User defined fields
